title: Is there a way to skip promos?
body: Literally EVERY single time I'm in promos there is an afker. Is there any way to skip it?

replies.body: You cannot skip above Platinum 1, they mentioned this when they introduced division/promo skipping.
To skip promos you have to have an mmr of one full tier above your current, also what the other guy said is false, you can skip promos in plat and even in diamond
But to skip promos in Diamond...that is...
If you have a high enough MMR and win some games you can usually skip promos (only up until plat though).
I meant promos. I have skipped promos before (went from 83LP in bronze 3 to bronze 1 without having to do my promos)
